chantey.title: My Tommy's Gone A High-Low.
chantey.text:
My Tommy's gone and I'll go too, _Hurrah!_ you high-low; For without Tommy I can't do, My _Tommy's_ gone a _high-low._
My Tommy's gone on the eastern shore, Chorus.
My Tommy's gone to Balimore, Chorus.
chantey.abc: X: 481 T: My Tommy's Gone A High-Low C: Trad. M: 3/4 L: 1/8 K: G D D E | G3 B A E | (G4 G) B | (A4 A) G | B (A E3) A | w: My Tom-my's gone and I'll go too,_ Hur-rah!_ you high-low;_ For A A A3 F | G E D3 D | G G B3 G | A G2 |] w: with-out Tom-my I can't do, My Tom-my's gone a high-low.
